mapper.select: select pwd from student where student_id=#{studentId}
select count(*) from student where student_id=#{studentId}

select * from scholarship sch join award a on sch.scholarship_no = a.scholarship_no join student s on a.stu_no = s.stu_no where s.student_id=#{studentId}
and semester=#{semester}
select name, stu_no, major from student where name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select name from student where stu_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into assignment(assign_no,open_sub_code, stu_no, file_name, file_size, original_file_name) values(#{assignNo},#{openSubCode}, #{stuNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{originalFileName})
mapper.select: select * from subject st join subj_type sj on st.type_code= sj.type_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = st.prof_no join open_subj os on os.subj_code = st.subj_code join registration rs on rs.open_sub_code = os.open_sub_code join student stu on stu.stu_no = rs.stu_no join distribute_assign b on b.open_sub_code = rs.open_sub_code where stu.student_id=#{studentId} and b.open_sub_code =#{openSubCode}

select * from assignment a join registration r on a.open_sub_code = r.open_sub_code join open_subj o on o.open_sub_code = a.open_sub_code join subject s on s.subj_code =o.subj_code where a.stu_no=#{stuNo}
